Data: will you use samples/materials? These are considered physical data in the context of a DMP, please list these the table and describe how you document, store and preserve these
Storage: do you have a specific reason to use external hard drives, the use of a KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup is more secure, have a look in the storage guide for more information: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
